thread.title: Tonielle Skiffer
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Tonielle Skiffer

author: Tonielle Skiffer
title: Tonielle Skiffer
text: I ordered a libing room set on Saturday that I really liked, in store. When it got to my home however, the furniture was too big for my space and not exactly the look I was looking for. The delivery drivers were patient with me and understanding when I decided that it would not work in my home. I called my salesman Terrence Robinson at the Groesbeck location, he said that I could send it back with the drivers and come in tomorrow (sunday) and pick out something else without problem. It was that easy!! I picked out another set and it was delivered without any issues an, guess what?! I love it!! Thank you!!!
